basic.description: This course includes development of ceramic techniques, concepts, and presentation strategies in support of personal aesthetic development using a potter's wheel.
basic.subject: ART
basic.title: Ceramics II: Wheel As Tool

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ART 1000, ART 1201C, ART 1203C, ART 1300C, ART 1602C, ART 2204C, and ART 4922.
